overview_of_class: This course provides an introduction to the principles of cell and molecular biology. The course will emphasize reasoning skills, experimental approaches, primary literature, and the theories that form the basis of our understanding of biology.
name: Molecular and Cell Biology for ISP
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 240-0-1 Molecular and Cell Biology for ISP

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course provides an introduction to the principles of cell and molecular biology. The course will emphasize reasoning skills, experimental approaches, primary literature, and the theories that form the basis of our understanding of biology.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Must be enrolled in the Integrated Sciences Program.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Essential Cell Biology, 4th Edition, 2014, Alberts et al., Garland Science ISBN 978-0-8153-4454-4

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value: ISP students only. Taking BIO 241 ISP Biochemistry prior to this course is highly recommended.

subject: BIOL_SCI
